ABOUT

I'm a self-taught frontend developer with over 3 years of experience creating responsive, interactive web projects. Driven by a passion for bringing ideas to life, I've honed my skills through hands-on work, turning concepts into impactful digital experiences. I'm now eager to collaborate with talented teams and contribute to meaningful projects that make a difference

Oct 2024 — PRESENT

Junior Developer Intern • Runforservice

Specialize in creating responsive and user-friendly web pages for e-commerce platforms, collaborate with backend teams to ensure seamless API integration and accurate data rendering. Work closely with clients and internal teams to transform business requirements into functional and visually appealing designs. Gain experience managing data in databases and continuously explores new technologies to deliver efficient and scalable solutions
